name: Train Rider: Worldwide Railway
description:
Train Rider 3D - enjoyable railway simulator that provides realistic driving experience, picturesque graphics and smooth controls. Go off on a journey full of unexpected turns. Take your seat and enjoy the ride!

Operate the train: choose directions and deliver as many passengers as you can. Discover more stations as you go farther and better your score.

Train Rider 3D FEATURES:
- unique routes;
- incredible driving experience;
- complete driver's console;
- eye-pleasing panoramas.

Train Rider 3D - this time, you are the driver!
